title: Appointment Confirmation Specialist
job_overview:
We're looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Appointment Confirmation Specialist to join our fast-growing agency. You’ll play a key role in confirming booked appointments for medspa clients, ensuring our show rates stay high and calendars stay full.

This is a part-time remote position supporting US-based clients, ideal for someone with a calm, professional phone presence and strong admin habits.

What You’ll Be Doing:

* Confirming scheduled medspa appointments via SMS and phone
* Updating appointment statuses and notes inside GoHighLevel and ClickUp
* Following confirmation scripts (we’ll train you) and maintaining polite, professional communication
* Reporting no-shows, reschedules, or cancellations to the team
* Flagging unconfirmed or missed appointments for follow-up
* Working EST hours (typically mornings and early afternoons)

What We’re Looking For:

* Prior experience in appointment setting, confirmations, call centers, or customer service
* Strong spoken and written English
* Comfortable using tools like GoHighLevel, ClickUp, CRMs, or call/SMS software
* Reliable internet, headset, and quiet working environment
* Confidence on the phone — without being pushy

What’s In It For You:

* Competitive hourly rate (based on experience and location)
* Fully remote, flexible part-time role
* Training provided — we’ll teach you the systems and scripts
* Opportunity to grow into a full-time position or team lead role
